scholarship.universityName: The Federal Urdu University of Arts, Science and Technology
scholarship.description: The Federal Urdu University of Arts, Science and Technology; alternatively known as FUUAST is a public university primarily located at Islamabad, Pakistan. The university has two satellite campuses; the central campus is located in Islamabad while the secondary campus is located in Karachi.
scholarship.title: Bachelor
scholarship.specialization: A specialization is a focused area of study of attached to a specific major, with specific coursework beyond major requirements.
